snippet.title: Stranger Things: Tales From ‘85 - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Brooklyn Davey Norstedt
snippet.description:
Check out Stranger Things: Tales From ‘85 teaser trailer for this upcoming animated series from Showrunner Eric Robles and Executive Producers the Duffer Brothers. Stranger Things: Tales From '85 features Brooklyn Davey Norstedt as Eleven, Jolie Hoang-Rappaport as Max, Luca Diaz as Mike, Elisha “EJ” Williams as Lucas, Braxton Quinney as Dustin, Benjamin Plessala as Will, Brett Gipson as Hopper, Jeremy Jordan as Steve, Odessa A’zion, Janeane Garofalo and Lou Diamond Phillips.

In the winter of 1985, snow blankets the town and the horrors of the Upside Down are finally fading. Our heroes Eleven, Mike, Will, Dustin, Lucas, and Max have settled back into a normal life of D&D, snowball fights, and quiet days. But beneath the ice, something terrifying has awakened. Could it be from the Upside Down? From the depths of Hawkins Lab? Or from somewhere else entirely? Our heroes must race to solve this mystery and save Hawkins in this untold story set in the Stranger Things universe.

Eric Robles is the showrunner & executive producer on Stranger Things: Tales From ‘85. Matt and Ross Duffer, along with Hilary Leavitt, via Upside Down Pictures; Shawn Levy via 21 Laps; Dan Cohen serve as executive producers. The animation studio is Flying Bark Productions. 

Stranger Things: Tales From ’85 premieres April 23 on Netflix.

#StrangerThingsTalesFrom85 #StrangerThings #IGN
